properties.name: tfi.enabled
properties.description: Master switch to enable TaskFlowInsight globally. Default false for security.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.enabled
properties.description: Enable change tracking functionality for monitoring object state changes.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.value-repr-max-length
properties.description: Maximum length for value representation in change tracking.

properties.name: tfi.context.max-age-millis
properties.description: Maximum age of context entries in milliseconds.

properties.name: tfi.context.leak-detection-enabled
properties.description: Enable leak detection for context entries.

properties.name: tfi.context.leak-detection-interval-millis
properties.description: Interval between leak detection checks in milliseconds.

properties.name: tfi.context.cleanup-enabled
properties.description: Enable automatic cleanup of expired context entries.

properties.name: tfi.context.cleanup-interval-millis
properties.description: Interval between cleanup operations in milliseconds.

properties.name: tfi.metrics.enabled
properties.description: Enable metrics collection and export.

properties.name: tfi.security.enable-data-masking
properties.description: Enable data masking for sensitive fields.

properties.name: tfi.annotation.enabled
properties.description: Enable TFI annotation processing. Requires tfi.enabled=true.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.cleanup-interval-minutes
properties.description: Cleanup interval for change tracking cache in minutes.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.max-cached-classes
properties.description: Maximum number of classes to cache for change tracking.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.snapshot.max-depth
properties.description: Maximum depth for object snapshot traversal.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.snapshot.max-elements
properties.description: Maximum number of elements to capture in collections.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.snapshot.excludes
properties.description: Field patterns to exclude from snapshots for security.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.snapshot.max-stack-depth
properties.description: Maximum stack depth for snapshot capture.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.snapshot.enable-deep
properties.description: Enable deep snapshot capturing for nested objects.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.diff.include-null-changes
properties.description: Include null value changes in diff output.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.diff.max-changes-per-object
properties.description: Maximum number of changes to track per object.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.diff.normalize-values
properties.description: Normalize values before comparing for changes.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.export.pretty-print
properties.description: Enable pretty printing for exported change tracking data.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.export.show-timestamp
properties.description: Include timestamps in exported change tracking data.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.export.include-sensitive-info
properties.description: Include sensitive information in exported data (security risk).

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.export.include-metadata
properties.description: Include metadata information in exported change tracking data.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.summary.enabled
properties.description: Enable change tracking summary generation.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.summary.max-size
properties.description: Maximum size of change tracking summary.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.summary.max-examples
properties.description: Maximum number of examples in change tracking summary.

properties.name: tfi.change-tracking.summary.sensitive-words
properties.description: Words to treat as sensitive in change tracking summary.

properties.name: tfi.metrics.tags
properties.description: Additional tags to apply to metrics.
